chara01.name: Barbarian
chara01.flavor: A brave Warrior from the North who was captured while on a raid. With great sword and shield in hand, they will storm out of this castle with all the might of the North behind them!

chara02.name: Magic Chef
chara02.flavor: A chef from the magic academy who 'bakes' pies with their magic wand! They will need to rely on their magic culinary expertise to escape the castle!

inventory.name: Magic Spatula
inventory.flavor: A magic spatula for fighting sentient pastries

chara03.name: Gorilla
chara03.flavor: A gorilla from the jungles of a far off land. Why anyone would want to capture one and bring it to this castle is a mystery. Gorilla just wants to swing on vines and eat bananas!

inventory.name: Pile of Bananas
inventory.flavor: A whole group of yummie bananas
